channel.title: Help with adding Christmas tree
channel.description: hey mopar i want to add a christmas tree in my server how can i add it in? thanks

item.title: Help with adding Christmas tree
item.dc:creator: @Alexander-Staneke Alexander-Staneke
item.description:
@Alexander-Staneke wrote:

Got them:

if(i == 10652){ objectDef.name = "Evergreen."; objectDef.objectModels[0] = ""10489"; objectDef.actions = new String[5]; objectDef.description = "A large tree.".getBytes(); }

if(i == 10653){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10490”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10654){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10491”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10655){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10486”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A large evergreen tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10656){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10487”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10657){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10488”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10658){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10491”; “10495”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10659){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10491”; 10495"; “10496”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10660){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10491”; 10495"; 10496"; “10497”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10661){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10488”; “10492”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10662){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10488”; 10492"; “10493”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10663){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10488”; 10492"; 10493"; “10494”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10664){
objectDef.name = “Tree”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10498”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A tall Trollweiss Spruce. An engraving on the trunk reads, ‘Ug loves Aga’.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10665){
objectDef.name = “Gifts”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10463”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “Boxes containing stuff.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10666){
objectDef.name = “Gifts”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = “10498”; “10463”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.actions[0] = “Unwrap presents”; null"; null"; null"; “null”;
objectDef.description = “Boxes containing stuff.”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 10671){
objectDef.name = “Crate”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10483”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “Only sawdust…”.getBytes();
}

Example:

if(i == 10653){
objectDef.name = “Evergreen.”;
objectDef.objectModels[0] = "“10490”;
objectDef.actions = new String[5];
objectDef.description = “A decorated tree.”.getBytes();
}

Bolt text is Object ID.
